backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the SurgiPaw backend defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for surgery cases, user profiles, and OpenAI config with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report identifying a single high-confidence feature to revert data-fetching logic in the frontend (useQueries.ts) to the Version 93 implementation to fix a regression where surgery cases failed to appear in DashboardView and CasesListView.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's React components, hooks, types, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, chart palette, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the SurgiPaw PWA, referencing the app icon, web manifest, theme color meta tags, and the Vite/React entry script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw specifying app name, display mode, theme colors, and icon assets at multiple resolutions.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first strategy with precaching of the app shell on install, old cache cleanup on activate, and runtime caching of static assets while skipping Internet Identity and API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, view navigation between Dashboard and Cases, profile setup modal display, and the sticky app header with login controls.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/I: SVG workflow icon component for the Culture task, rendering three small circles inside a larger circle using the culture workflow color token.
SVG workflow icon component for the Discharge Notes task, depicting a document with a checkmark using the discharge workflow color token.
SVG workflow icon component for the Follow-Up task, showing a circular arrow using the followup workflow color token.
SVG workflow icon component for the Histopathology task, depicting a microscope-like shape using the histo workflow color token.
SVG workflow icon component for the Imaging task, showing a framed chart/graph using the imaging workflow color token.
SVG workflow icon component for the Labs task, depicting a test tube using the labs workflow color token.
SVG workflow icon component for the PDVM Notified task, rendering a speech bubble shape using the notified workflow color token.
SVG workflow icon component for the Surgery Report task, depicting a document with a scalpel line using the surgery workflow color token.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/W: Maps task type strings to their corresponding icon components and renders the matching icon, returning null for unknown or missing types.
Renders a base SVG wrapper with consistent size, stroke, and color tokens for workflow icons, accepting children for the icon paths.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/w: Exports shared design tokens for workflow icons including a color map per task type, icon size, and stroke width.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Empty file placeholder for an authentication React context.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Au: Empty file placeholder for the authentication view component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Renders a login/logout button that uses Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and query cache clearing.
Empty file placeholder for a login form component.
Empty file placeholder for a logout button component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Displays a non-dismissible dialog prompting a newly authenticated user to enter their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Re: Empty file placeholder for a registration form component.
frontend/src/features/auth/validation.ts: Empty file placeholder for authentication validation logic.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the checklist item configuration for surgery case tasks and provides utility functions to get default selections, remaining incomplete items, and task colors.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Empty file placeholder for a camera capture modal component.
Renders an expandable card for a surgery case showing patient info, remaining checklist tasks, and actions for editing, toggling task completion, and deleting the case.
Dialog for editing an existing surgery case's fields and task checklist selections, pre-populating form state from the provided case and saving via the updateCase mutation.
Dialog for creating a new surgery case with form fields, checklist task selections, speech-to-text quick fill, structured text parsing, and duplicate case detection from previous records.

Main list view component for surgery cases that combines search, filtering (species, tasks), sorting, and pagination, and renders CaseCard components along with controls for creating new cases and CSV import/export.
A search input component with a clear button that allows users to search cases by any field.
A dropdown select control for choosing the sort order of the cases list, using predefined SORT_OPTIONS.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by species (canine, feline, other), with selection state persisted to sessionStorage.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by task types and completed status, with filter state persisted to sessionStorage.
Renders a checklist of selected tasks for a given Task object, allowing toggling of individual task completion states with visual strikethrough feedback.
Provides CSV export and import functionality for surgery cases, handling parsing, validation errors, progress tracking, and backend create/update mutations.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component supporting manual MM/DD/YYYY entry with auto-slash insertion and a calendar popover picker, with blur validation and auto-advance on completion.
Provides functions to export surgery cases to a CSV file and import cases from a CSV file, including row parsing, validation, and error reporting.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV column headers, TypeScript row type, and validation constants (valid species, sex, boolean, and date format) for veterinary surgery case import/export.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Exports utility functions to filter surgery cases by species, task types, incomplete tasks, or fully completed tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: A React hook that wraps the browser's SpeechRecognition API to provide recording state, transcript accumulation, error handling, and start/stop controls.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors, and removing artifacts to produce cleaner text for further parsing.
Parses label:value formatted text lines into a partial CaseFormData object by mapping recognized field labels to their corresponding typed values.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates and triggers a browser print dialog for a styled HTML report of surgery cases that have at least one incomplete task, using a hidden iframe.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of all surgery cases, including patient details and remaining checklist tasks, with proper CSV escaping and a timestamped filename.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utility functions for PDF display, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex types to human-readable strings, plus text truncation and task list formatting.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utility functions for CSV report output, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex types to human-readable strings.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters a list of surgery cases by a search query, matching against patient/owner fields and also against incomplete checklist task labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that sorts surgery cases by arrival date or number of remaining open tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines constant option arrays for Species and Sex dropdowns, and the CaseFormData interface used for surgery case form state.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields (MRN, pet name, owner name, breed) and date conversion/parsing utilities between Date objects, nanoseconds, and MM/DD/YYYY strings.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard React component that fetches all surgery cases, applies search/filter/sort controls, and renders case cards along with summary stats and a new-case dialog.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract open task items from a surgery case and calculate the total count of remaining tasks across all cases.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the debounced value after the specified timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state, AuthClient creation, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for all backend CRUD operations on surgery cases, tasks, user profiles, dashboard data, and OpenAI config, using the actor and identity hooks for authenticated requests.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light-mode design system, including colors for backgrounds, cards, charts, and semantic UI elements.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with TanStack QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf-autotable module.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf module.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript ambient module declaration for tesseract.js, defining interfaces for OCR workers, recognition results, and enums for page segmentation and OCR engine modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends the theme with Inter font and custom border radii, and registers the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for SurgiPaw tracking version, known issues, and feature requests; currently flagged as a fix request to revert a data-fetching regression introduced in Version 97.
